title: section 5 of the Act of 2023 made to a relevant person within the meaning of that
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1970 (section 58A
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1970 (section 58A 

(12)) (Classes of Payments) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1970 (section 58a (12)) (classes payments) regulation 2024

title: section 5 of the Act of 2023 made to a relevant person within the meaning of that
heading: 2. The following classes of payments under the Scheme established by
text_raw:
2. The following classes of payments under the Scheme established by 
section 5 of the Act of 2023 made to a relevant person within the meaning of that 
Act are prescribed for the purposes of section 58A (12) of the Health Act 1970 
(No. 1 of 1970): 

(a) 

a general payment within the meaning of the Act of 2023; 

(b) 

a work-related payment within the meaning of the Act of 2023.
text_norm: 2 following class payment scheme established section 5 act 2023 made relevant person within meaning act prescribed purpose section 58a (12) health act 1970 (no 1 1970) (a) general payment within meaning act 2023 (b) work-related payment within meaning act 2023

title: section 5 of the Act of 2023 made to a relevant person within the meaning of that
heading: In these Regulations, “Act of 2023” means the Mother and Baby
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations, “Act of 2023” means the Mother and Baby 

Institutions Payment Scheme Act 2023 (No. 20 of 2023). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 April, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th July, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [154] 3
text_norm: 3 regulation act 2023 mean mother baby institution payment scheme act 2023 (no 20 2023) given official seal 11 april 2024 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 5th july 2024 154 3

title: section 5 of the Act of 2023 made to a relevant person within the meaning of that
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides that a general payment and a work-related payment made 
to a relevant person under the Mother and Baby Institutions Payment Scheme 
Act 2023 will be disregarded in the calculation of gross income for eligibility for 
health services under section 58A of the Health Act 1970. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [154]
